data.question: What is the chemical formula for the compound synthesized from 1,3,5-triethynylbenzene?
What method was used for the powder X-ray diffraction patterns collection?
data.answer: Beamline 17-BM-B at the Advanced Photon Source at Argonne National Laboratory

data.question: What is the purpose of using a saturated MgSO4 salt bath in the experiments?
data.answer: To control the percent relative humidity for Co-BTTri air and moisture stability tests

data.question: What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of H3BTTri from 1,3,5-triethynylbenzene?
What is the crystal system and space group for Co-BTTri–DMF at 100 K?
What is the final product obtained from the synthesis involving 1,3,5-triethynylbenzene, NaN3, CH3COOH, CH2O, CuSO4, and sodium ascorbate?
Is the compound Co-BTTri stable when exposed to room temperature air at 90% relative humidity?
What is the method used for magnetic susceptibility measurements in the study?
What is the main difference in the synthesis of H3BDTriP compared to H3BTTri?
data.answer: H3BDTriP synthesis involves the use of a ligand where one of the triazole moieties is replaced with a pyrazole

data.question: Does the synthesis of H3BDTriP involve the use of TMS-acetylene and Pd(PPh3)2Cl2?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of H3BDTriP?
What is the crystal system and space group for Co-BDTriP–O2?
What is the role of sodium ascorbate in the synthesis of H3BTTri?
data.answer: It acts as a reducing agent in the copper-catalyzed azide-alkyne cycloaddition reaction

data.question: Is the compound Co-BDTriP more selective for O2 over N2 at 195 K compared to Co-BTTri?
What is the main advantage of Co-BDTriP over Co-BTTri for air separation processes?
data.answer: Co-BDTriP demonstrates markedly higher O2 affinities and selectivities

data.question: What is the main structural feature of Co-BTTri and Co-BDTriP that contributes to their O2 binding properties?
data.answer: The presence of coordinatively unsaturated cobalt(II) centers

data.question: What is the significance of the isosteric heat of adsorption for O2 in Co-BTTri?
data.answer: It indicates the strength of interaction between O2 and the coordinatively unsaturated cobalt(II) centers

data.question: Can Co-BTTri be cycled multiple times without loss in adsorption capacity for O2?
What is the role of dimethylformamidium trifluoromethanesulfonate in the synthesis of Co-BTTri?
data.answer: It is used as a reagent in the synthesis process, likely as a source of trifluoromethanesulfonate anion

data.question: Is the synthesis of H3BDTriP more complex than that of H3BTTri?
